subject.subjectDiscription: Get Started with the Language of building web Pages

topic1.name: What is HTML?
topic1.content1: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language
topic1.content2: HTML is the standard markup language for creating Web pages
topic1.content3: HTML elements tell the browser how to display the content
topic1.content4: HTML consists of a series of elements

topic2.name: A Simple HTML Document
topic2.content1: The <!DOCTYPE html> declaration defines that this document is an HTML5 document
